content.en_US:
The "default" ammunition type for most guns. Soft point bullets do not change the gun's base damage, and don't have any armor-piercing properties.

Due to being expanding projectiles, soft points are prohibited for use in warfare under the Hague Conventions of 1899.
content.zh_CN:
“默认”的弹药类型。软尖弹不影响枪械的基础伤害，也不具有穿甲特性。

由于属于扩张型弹药，1889年的海牙公约禁止在战争中使用软尖弹。
